sentences.en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
sentences.cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

sentences.en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentences.cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentences.en: he claims not to own anything other than his home.
sentences.cn: 他声称除了家他一无所有。

sentences.en: he claims not to own anything other than his home.
sentences.cn: 他声称除了家他一无所有。

sentences.en: He mixes well with other children in the school.
sentences.cn: 他在学校里与其他孩子能很好相处。

sentences.en: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.cn: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

sentences.en: He would have to accept it; there was no other way.
sentences.cn: 对此他将别无选择，只有接受。

sentences.en: Her bed was screened off from the other patients.
sentences.cn: 她的病床用屏风与其他病人隔开。

sentences.en: His misunderstanding of language was the primary cause of his other problems.
sentences.cn: 他对语言的误解是引起其他问题的主要原因。

sentences.en: if you keep a lot of rules I'll reward you, and if you don't I'll do the other thing.
sentences.cn: 如你遵守许多规则我就奖励你，否则我就选择另一种方式。

sentences.en: Online gaming allows players from around the world to challenge each other.
sentences.cn: 网络游戏使得全球的玩家可以相互较量。

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: Other causes of migraine are VDU screens and strip-lighting.
sentences.cn: 偏头痛的其他诱因还有电脑的视频显示器和灯管照明。

sentences.en: She excelled all other authors of her day.
sentences.cn: 她超过同时代的所有其他作家。

sentences.en: The other hotels are all full.
sentences.cn: 其他的宾馆均已客满。

sentences.en: The radio said other parts of the capital also came under shellfire.
sentences.cn: 广播上说首都的其他地区也遭到了炮火袭击。

sentences.en: They were just like any other young couple.
sentences.cn: 他们那时就和其他任何年轻夫妇一样。

sentences.en: they were protesting about something or other.
sentences.cn: 他们正在对一件什么事表示抗议。

sentences.en: This issue, more than any other, has divided her cabinet.
sentences.cn: 主要是这一问题使她的内阁产生了分歧。

sentences.en: Truckloads of food, blankets, and other necessities reached the city.
sentences.cn: 成车的食物、毯子与其他必需品抵达了该市。

sentences.en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentences.cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentences.en: we can do no other.
sentences.cn: 我们别无他法。

sentences.en: What other home offers such a commanding view of the capital?
sentences.cn: 还有其他的房子能像这幢一样俯瞰首都吗？

sentences.en: You can chat to other people who are online.
sentences.cn: 你可以和其他在线的人聊天。

sentences.en: You can't have one without the other, as the song says.
sentences.cn: 就像歌里唱的那样，两者密不可分，不能只取其一。

phrases.tran_cn: 其中；尤其；除了别的之外
所有其他的；每隔一个的
在其他条件都相同的情况下

phrases.phrase: someone (或 something 或 somehow 等) or other
phrases.tran_cn: [用来表示不确切或不肯定] 某人（或某件东西、某件事；或以某种方式、用某种办法）

phrases.phrase: the other day (或 night, week 等)
phrases.tran_cn: 几天（或几夜，几星期）之前
(英，旧，主幽默)没有明说的另一做法

trans.tran_cn: 其他的，另外的，额外的，另一的，余下的，别人的
trans.tran_en: You use other to refer to an additional thing or person of the same type as one that has been mentioned or is known about
used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about

trans.tran_cn: 另外，其他，另一个，其他的

trans.tran_en: You use other to refer to an additional thing or person of the same type as one that has been mentioned or is known about
